NeedDef.label: proteins
NeedDef.description: The main building material of the body. Growth and normal tissue regeneration are not possible without it. They are present in the composition of meat food and in some plants.

NeedDef.label: fats
NeedDef.description: One of the most important components of the diet. They perform a structural and energetic function, being a long-term energy reserve. Present in the composition of animal food, milk and meat.

NeedDef.label: carbohydrates
NeedDef.description: An extensive class of compounds that forms the basis of most plants. In the body of a living being, they perform an energetic function.

NeedDef.label: vitamins
NeedDef.description: Class of chemical compounds that ensure the normal functioning of body systems. Their deficiency can cause serious disorders in the functioning of organs. Many plants are rich in vitamins.
